itemDisplayName: DefenderXDR C2 XSOAR - Microsoft Security Orchestration Platform v3.4.0
description: Deploy an Azure Function App for Microsoft Defender XDR automation with 246 actions across 6 security services. Includes incident/alert management, batch processing, and workbook-based UI with managed identity support.
summary: Azure Function App for Microsoft Defender XDR with 246 automated remediation actions
